The Quranic researcher is a color for the discourse and his success to him to the Messenger of God ﷺ by their projection from the arrangement of the speech, that is, they are cried to them, which is the one who is good for them The minds are a leader who is confronting to correct it, and the emerging sentence in the position of the second laborer is to ask and the verb at the authority of Abu Hayyan The questioning, and the question is a slight of knowledge, because it is a reason for his crops, or they have partners who shake them in this saying, and they will be given to them.In their parts, if they were honest in their calling, as there is no less than the conversion, and the alerts of their pursuit and the exalted in these verses on the negation of all of what can be attached to all of them.He called them, as he alerted to the negative of the mind of the mind, with the words of what you have, how do you judge you A book, etc., and on the negation that God is the Almighty and their promise with that, and the promise of the generous is a debt with his saying, they are their mother, or for you, and for us, etc.The moon, with his saying, is glorified, and the mother of them is a partner, and the meaning was said to have a god of their enemy, whose enemy is a partner in the idols that make them like Muslims in the last.And the servant of God and Ibn Abi Ubila read, “Let them come to their polytheism” and what I want to do with their parts.
